revised_title: Comparing the Botany and Climate of the Southern Cold Temperate Zone and Tropical High Mountains
tldr: The author discusses the similarities and differences in plant life and climate between the southern cold temperate zone and tropical high mountains. They explore how factors like temperature, frost action, and plant adaptations contribute to these similarities and differences. The author also highlights the exchange of plant species between these zones and their impact on the overall flora.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
